long_description: This Nathan Reflective Cycling Vest delivers 360deg reflectivit yfor visibilityin dim light from the first mile to the last. Made from soft, breathable mesh and reflective material that allows you to be seen up to 1,200 ft. away; cycling-specific design ensures a great fit. Extended tail offers coverage in the bent-over cycling position; reflective strap keepers keep the adjustable side straps from flapping in the wind. Includes visible, waterproof identification card and a hidden key pocket. Horizontal opening across back makes for easy access to bike jersey pockets. Small loop on the back lets you secure a LED safety light (sold separately). The Nathan Reflective Cycling Vest can be adjusted to fine-tune the fit; 1 size fits most.
short_description: This Nathan Reflective Cycling Vest delivers 360deg reflectivit yfor visibilityin dim light from the first mile to the last.
